settld-produce explain
ok=false
kind=jobproof
out=<TMP>/jobproof
signerMode=remote
signerTransport=http
signerAuth=bearer tokenSource=env:SETTLD_SIGNER_TOKEN
signerHeaders=X-Secret
error=SIGNER_AUTH_MISSING causeKind=signer causeCode=REMOTE_SIGNER_AUTH_MISSING
hint: set --signer-token-env or --signer-token-file (see docs/spec/REMOTE_SIGNER.md)
internalErrorCode=REMOTE_SIGNER_AUTH_MISSING
